title: can any rioter please check if am i getting diamond or platinum rewards?
body:
so ranked season has ended. but when i logged on 11/8 i realized my rank is demoted to platinum 1 from diamond 5 due to being inactive. i was still diamond 5 by 11/7 4pm afternoon and rank was closed that night so im not too sure if i was demoted before rank locked or after. can any rioter please check for me if i am getting a diamond border or platinum border? thanks!
 if i was demoted just a few hours before rank locked is there anyway you guys can make an exception for me and let me still get the diamond rewards?? other wise i would be really sad for a whole season =(

replies.body: I don't have a snapshot of where you finished, but may have those details once the rewards have rolled out to eligible players.  It's really risky to finish up on the last day and face a decay, and hopefully everything works out.  Good luck!
just received my platinum rewards... is there anything i can do about that? droped to plat 1 due to decay just a few hours before rank closed is so sad... please riot ~~~ >_<
